briefdescription.para: Ensure capacity for the entry array.
Ensure capacity for the string table.

simplesect.para: Pointer to a new builder, or NULL on allocation failure.

briefdescription.para: Destroy a spec builder and release memory.
Add (or reuse) a string in the builder's string table.

simplesect.para: Offset into the eventual string table (name_off), or 0 on failure.
Offset 0 is valid if the string table starts at offset 0; however this builder uses a leading '\0' sentinel so offset 0 is reserved, and failures return 0.

briefdescription.para: Write bytes to a stream or fail.

memberdef.argsstring: (dedup_spec_builder_t *b, const char *path, uint64_t defaults_bytes, uint64_t exceptions_bytes, uint64_t masks_bytes)
memberdef.name: dedup_spec_builder_write_file

parameterdescription.para: Total bytes written to defaults.bin (for header info).
Total bytes written to exceptions.bin (for header info).
Total bytes written to masks.bin (for header info).

briefdescription.para: Compute a 64-bit FNV-1a hash for bytes (helper).
Implementation of the dedup spec builder and helpers.
